00026 double Matern3CF::correlation(double sqDist) const
00027 {
00028     double r = sqrt(3.0 * sqDist) / lengthScale;
00029      
00030     return (1.0+r) * exp(-r);
00031 }

00033 
00042 double Matern3CF::correlationGradient(int p, double sqDist) const
00043 {
00044         double r;
00045         assert(p>=0 && p<numberParameters);
00046 
00047     switch (p) {
00048     // Gradient with respect to length scale
00049     case 0:
00050         r = sqrt(3.0 * sqDist) / lengthScale;
00051         return sqr(r) / lengthScale * exp(-r);
00052 
00053     // Gradient with respect to process variance
00054     case 1:
00055         return 0.0;
00056     }
00057 }
